flag_auto_theme_desc: make e detect dark/light theme based on terminal background
flag_export_png_desc: export traffic graph go PNG file
flag_export_svg_desc: export traffic graph go SVG file
flag_export_theme_desc: name of theme wey you wan export
flag_export_theme_file_desc: path wey dem go write exported theme JSON/YAML
flag_i18n_file_desc: path to di JSON translation file
flag_i_desc: network interface wey you wan monitor
flag_plugins_desc: comma-separated list of .so plugin files wey you wan load
flag_style_desc: UI style wey you wan use
flag_theme_desc: color theme wey you wan use
flag_theme_file_desc: path to custom theme JSON/YAML file
requires_root: dis app need root/admin right to capture packets
run_as_root: abeg run am with sudo or as admin
